name: Bloom Residences
cardDescription: Bloom Residences in Paranaque is home-sweet home that's luxuriously comfortable. Strategically located in Sucat, everything you'll ever need is right within your reach.
bannerAbout: Have a glimpse of the life lived in glitz and glamour, with gold curtain walls that surround this luminescent development. Inspired by the entertainment industry's zest for recognition, Fame Residences stands proud as the crowning glory of Central EDSA. A trophy providing a true sense of prominence to its residents.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Let our warmhearted staff tend our sprouting community so you can focus on flourishing. Expect a lush, grand welcome from Bloom Residences' luxurious hotel-like lobbies, while our generous staff will treat you like our own family.

feature.title: Let life blossom in Parañaque
feature.description: With its safe environment and an inviting neighborhood, Bloom Residences makes for a great place to build your budding career or start a family and raise children of your own.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Bloom Residences provides a haven for urbanities and young families who want to stay active and healthy through multitude of recreational amenities. Residents can enjoy a dynamic lifestyle all year round! To promote fitness and wellness to its residents, Bloom Residences provides various meditation and fitness activities through its amenities.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Recharge in the comfort of your home after a swim or your family jog. Bloom residences offers pleasant yet cosmopolitan units for your much-needed rest and relaxation.

type.name: 2 Bedroom End Unit with Mezzanine and Balcony
2 Bedroom Unit with Mezzanine and Balcony

name: Cool Suites at Wind Residences
cardAddress: Brgy. Maharlika West, Tagaytay City, Cavite
cardDescription: With SMDC's signature 5-star amenities, it is a perfect holiday home for those who enjoy the cool wind of Tagaytay.
bannerAbout: Cool Suites is the newest garden complex in the flourishing Wind Residences estate. Nestled inside the complex is an array of lush foliage and greenery that serve as a private retreat where you can relax and recover from the busy work week. With SMDC’s signature 5-star amenities, it is a perfect holiday home for those who enjoy the cool wind of Tagaytay
bannerFeatures: Commercial Strip at the Ground Floor (Tower A)
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Fall in love with Cool Suites with its charming modern country home-inspired tower lobby. Using natural elements combined with a warm fire place, the ambiance become cozier and more romantic.

feature.title: A Volcano and Lake View
feature.description: Surrounded by gorgeous views of the mountains, Taal Lake, and Taal Volcano, Cool Suites in Tagaytay City lets you enjoy the beauty of nature alongside the cool breezes that sweep through.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: At Cool Suites, enjoy intimate getaways as you unwind surrounded by sprawling garden. Relish moments to recharge- a heart picnic, a peaceful stroll, a refreshing jog or a restful moment under a tree. Truly a place to replenish your soul.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Your perfect getaway from the city. A cool sanctuary that makes every day feel like a five-star vacation.

name: Gem Residences
cardDescription: Discover this hidden gem along C5, one of Metro Manila's most important and strategic transportation corridors. It is located in the vicinity of multiple businesses and schools, and offers easy accessibility to the nearby commercial districts of Ortigas Center, Eastwood, and BGC, as well as the NLEX and SLEX.
bannerAbout: Gem Residences perfectly captures your modern aspiration for work-life integration. Standing gorgeously along C-5 Pasig, the thriving center of economic activity east of Metro Manila, Gem Residences brings you world-class amenities that cater to your need for both productivity and leisure.

name: Gold Residences
cardDescription: Elevate your way of living and experience rare exclusivity with SMDC' newest iconic residential landmark in Parañaque City.
bannerAbout: Find the perfect combination of homey comfort and modern in-city living in Gold Residences. Developed with the typical urban family in mind, Gold Residences offers a seamless blend of resort-like and luxury living.

Perfect for the family looking for comfort, security and relaxation

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Anticipate a grand welcome and walk the hallways of sophistication at the property’s lobby area. The modern interior design is a distinctive taste of quality and class, accented by ornate details that complement the entire space, like the marble tiles, panoramic glass doors, and custom-designed sofas.

feature.title: Striking, Modern, Unparalleled
feature.description: Gold Residences is SMDC’s first township designed to be the gold standard in all aspects. Its 11.6-hectare master-planned community stands across Ninoy Aquino International Airport makes it easy for jetsetters to get to where they want to go. Inside, its sophisticated aesthetic, architecture, and premium amenities make it a joy to behold and live in.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Soak up in the beauty of what life has to offer as you take a dip in Gold Residences leisure pools. The flourishing landscaped lounge area allows you to do activities and have fun. Boost your mood and get energized as you utilize the top-tiered facilities at the Fitness Center.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Make your place work for you and style it the way you want at Gold Residences. There’s an abundance of units that await you; you can either personalize the space according to your liking or let the luxurious design speak for itself.

name: Gold Offices
cardDescription: GOLD OFFICES is the first and only office space development open to public for sale.
bannerAbout: GOLD RESIDENCES & OFFICES belong to a 11.5 hectare master planned township located in front of Manila International Airport NAIA Terminal, in direct proximity to Manila Bay entertainment city.
bannerFeatures: 10-12 min. to Manila Casinos - Entertainment City (COD City of Dreams, Okada and Solaire)
bannerAmenities: Shuttle bus to Airport and nearby Residential

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Designed to awe and inspire. The lobbies' modern, yet opulent design reflects success and inspires residents and guests alike to reach greater heights.

feature.title: Soar to Golden Heights
feature.description: At Gold Towers Residential Offices, business meets leisure in a premium condominium development with features and amenities perfectly suited for entrepreneurs and business veterans alike. It is situated across Ninoy Aquino International Airport’s Terminal 1, making it extremely convenient when making business trips, and many establishments offer further variety.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: The perfect hub for thriving local business with global ambitions.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Choose the workspace size and spectacular views that make for an environment that is conducive to productivity and creativity.

name: Hill Residences
cardDescription: Hill Residences is the right balance of convenience and comfort. Everything you and your family need is within reach. Located near transportation hubs, restaurants, malls, and specialty stores, all you have to think about is where to go next.
bannerAbout: For the right balance of comfort and convenience, look no further than Hill Residences in Novaliches, Quezon City. This elevated home gives you access to topnotch amenities and must-visit restaurants, retail zones, and entertainment spots.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: At Hill Residences, success speaks for itself with the hotel-like ambience that will impress your guests with its elegant, luxurious design. The natural colors that will envelope the interior and the warm welcome of the staff will make you feet at home from the lobby up to the suites.

feature.title: Convenience meets comfort
feature.description: Located in Novaliches, Quezon City, Hill Residences gives you and your family everything you could ever need in a modern setting. Transportation hubs, restaurants, malls, specialty stores, and more abound, and Wi-Fi ready zones, jogging paths, a park, and a basketball court ensure that you’ll never want for things to do and see.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Hill Residences welcomes you with amenities that turn your home into your personal resort including an outdoor swimming pool that homeowners and guest can dive into.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: A Flexible Home Introducing, the Flexi Suite: an open-plan concept that gives you the freedom to design the unit the way you want it. It can be laid out as a studio unit or a two-bedroom floor plan depending on how you want to utilize your space. It is truly a home that grows with you.

type.name: Flexi Suite End Unit with Balcony

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby

feature.title: Everything within Reach

Inside, open spaces offer families a safe place to enjoy recreational activities.

amenity.description: Lane Residences is designed with lush greenery and multiple open spaces to create a calming atmosphere, perfect for leisure. Have a picnic, play with your family at the playground, take a stroll, play a pick-up game of basketball, or lounge at the clubhouse.

feature.title: Your very own bayside home
feature.description: Sands Residences is 51-floor master-planned community where the sea and sun are always at your side. Beyond that, the convenience of its Roxas Boulevard location lets you quickly reach spots like the MoA complex, nearby cultural hubs, entertainment halls, parks, and more.
